text:
Hey guys,
I'm trying to get all the properties of a deal via this endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/deals/> but in some enumeration-type fields, I'm getting an empty array of options. How to get all the options of an enumeration field property?

A quick qs, I want to list all the tags in listing page.
```{{ blog_tags("default", 250) }}```
Above code only get most used tags not all

Do the excluded tags have posts?
Does your portal have multiple blogs?
is your app showing up in the connected apps section?
And this is for a custom workflow action right? Are the actions `published: true`?

Can't find how to trigger workflows based on viewing specific landing pages in HubSpot. Have sales hub enterprise, operations hub pro, marketing hub starter.

Alternative solution could be a standalone form that submits itself - but can't figure out how to do this either.

Or even to trigger actions when a link in the email (sales email) is clicked.

Anyone done either of these?

Hey guys, I want to delete multiple users from our organisation and have their respective email ids. I came across this link: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/accounting#endpoint?spec=DELETE-/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-accounts/%7BaccountId%7D>
Only problem is, this API accepts accountId and not email, so is there any way I can get accountId by email id?
You'll want to use this endpoint:
Also just a PSA, the accounting api is completely deprecated
Can anyone give me more insight on `<https://forms.hscollectedforms.net>`? Is it for collecting data in HubSpot for non-HubSpot forms?

Good morning from Germany :wave:
I am trying to automatically name a custom object while I create them from the frontend. The name itself can be a random name or a unique ID, it doesn't matter.

The HubSpot support told me, that there is no native solution but maybe some custom code.
Does anyone have a helping hand for me?
i have no idea, but i think you can filter it it?
